Text:
Thanks for the upload !!!

What a truly great movie !!!
Thanks a lot for this.  It seemed a lot better to me with a 1.7s delay in the subtitles (Tools-> track Synchronisation in VLC).

Copy is very good.

Movie is pretty good too. 

Thanks a lot uploader and all seeders.
Thx a lot uploader and seeders :D
Imageshack now blocks people coming from TPB, i.e. they're blocking the referrer. In order to see the screenshots, you have to manually copy & paste the link into your browser's address bar.
